website_summaries.verdict: With 17 pieces total, this set completes a high-end kitchen all at once.
pros: We love that this set is made with high quality stainless steel
Built-in measuring systems aid with cooking
Safe for ovens, freezers, and dishwashers
Customers are consistently pleased with results
cons: Pans require some seasoning to prevent stick

customer_reviews.title: Been very happy so far (3 years and counting)
customer_reviews.text: Been very happy so far. I decided to go with these, with some trepidation, after using All Clad and Calphalon in the past - the attraction was primarily the lower cost. They feel substantial and seem well constructed. I've had none of the problems mentioned in other reviews here at Amazon: lids fit well, no discoloration even after washing in the dishwasher. I also like the pasta basket, which I hadn't used before. I am following the manufacturer's advice and not using excessively high heat (my range is gas) to avoid damaging the pans. I plan to update this review if I encounter any unexpected problems in the future. Update: 3 years in and still no problems. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice until it breaks
customer_reviews.text: I got this product one month ago and the lid exploded and cracked. Very low flame as you can see in the picture. Was just simmering some beans
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Right out of the box!
customer_reviews.text: Just got our 17 piece set. Look great right out of the box. Bottoms have heavy, solid construction and are very flat. Sides bordering on thin but the bottom is most important with induction I suppose. Should make good contact with our new induction range. 4 star without using them. Will season before use many reviews have recommended. I’ll come back with further reviews after using them a couple of weeks.
customer_reviews.author: J. Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Hate them!!!
customer_reviews.text: HATE these pots and pans. Wish I could return them, but I have already thrown away the box. Everything sticks to them and they are all stained after 1 use. Don’t buy these!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well made, looks good, and works with our induction cooktop
customer_reviews.text: We bought a new induction cooktop about a month ago which meant we needed to purchase cookware that would work with the new cooktop. After a lot of research and reading reviews, we settled on the Duxtop SSIB-17 Professional 17 Pieces Stainless Steel Induction Cookware Set. I had never heard of this brand before, but took the chance due to the positive reviews. Our experience is that the cookware is a bargain compared to some of the other name brands out there. The pieces are beautifully crafted, heavy duty and cook nicely. We looked at the Wolf cookware to match our cooktop, but was really put off by the price. I believe we made the right choice by choosing Duxtop.
customer_reviews.author: Paul R Infanti

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT USE WITH INDUCTION COOKTOP - HORRIBLE PINGING NOISE AND YOU CANNOT RETURN
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this set for use with my new Kitchen Aid induction range and it is WAY annoying to use. It does fine heating up, but once the hob starts to cycle on simmer and the cookware "pings". It is worst with the saucepans, mostly likely from the much more irregular bottom surface. The sauté pans are less noise and almost tolerable. All induction ranges make noise, but this is awful and most likely produced by the irregular surface on the bottom. My smooth bottom. cookware, including cast iron does just fine. Worst of all, I find out when I tried to return it that this item cannot be returned. Grrrrrrrrrr!
customer_reviews.author: kemp4VT

customer_reviews.title: The cookware sticks extremely bad!
customer_reviews.text: I am completely disappointed with this pot/skillet set. When My husband and I purchased this set, we thought it would be a great investment. The pot and skillet set sticks everything we cook in them. We read the owners manual, and did everything it said. But this was just a waste of our hard earned money. I wish I could have given this set 0 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this product
customer_reviews.text: The frying pans included in this product are the worst I have ever used. They have absolutely no "Non stick" ability. Food sticks to the almost like it's fused to the metal. It takes a ten minute rugged cleaning with steel wool or Brillo pad to remove food from the cook surface. You can't return them so DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Joetherob

customer_reviews.title: EVERYTHING STICKS
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set because the reviews were mostly good and was looking to get away from Teflon, yeah wrong...... anything you cook will stick, tried all the tricks, butter, less oil, more oil, hell even boiling chicken in water it had residue stick to the sides
customer_reviews.author: Charles D McKinney

customer_reviews.title: Everything Sticks
customer_reviews.text: We have tried everything method possible for our food not to stick and nothing has worked. It is such a hassle and just not worth it. It's definitely not worth the money. When we were searching for a good cookware induction set, this brand came up. We researched it and it had great ratings. At the time we did not see that Amazon had the same set in NONSTICK or we would have purchased that, even though they are more expensive. They aren't easy to clean either.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Leal

customer_reviews.title: If you want a first quality cookware look no further
customer_reviews.text: We just upgraded t a new induction cooktop and had to look for new cookware. I researched and came up with this set of cookware. When they arrived I was impressed with the way they looked and felt in my hands, then when I used them on my cooktop I knew I would be very happy I purchased this cookware. I would recommend this cookware to anyone wanting/needing to upgrade to a new set of cookware. Yes, they work perfectly with induction cooktops.
customer_reviews.author: Herb Lorenz

customer_reviews.title: We love this cookware set
customer_reviews.text: I waited a few months before writing this review to make good and darned sure we had enough time to thoroughly use this cookware set. Now that we've been using it almost daily for more than half a year I can safely say this is the best cookware set we've ever had. They're very attractive, they distribute heat very well and we're looking forward to using these pieces for at least 20 years. Solid, fast-heating and easy to use. A++
customer_reviews.author: zippyrich

customer_reviews.title: Truly induction ready set!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made set of pots and pans. The sizes are perfect for my everyday needs. They function smoothly with my new induction cooktop which is the reason why I was shopping for a new set. I did later purchase one nonstick skillet for cooking eggs. But that was the only modification I made to this set. I do not use the tools the set came with I own others I prefer. I would purchase this set again. I am very happy with the overall usability of this set. Cooks great.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this cookware! We bought an induction stove for our new home so I used my pots and pans last night for the first time. Looking at these pots and pans, I noticed how sturdy and well made they looked and felt. While cooking, I noticed that the lids and handles stayed cool to the touch even with boiling liquid in the pots! The clean up was a breeze as well. I do recommend that silicone utensils be used. The only drawback is that they are not made in the US.
customer_reviews.author: nrsneese

customer_reviews.title: Despite negative reviews, these are really nice!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little hesitant to buy these after reading the reviews. Happily, I have found this set to be wonderful, and they work just fine. Cooking on an induction cooktop has a learning curve. I’ve burned a few things (even set off the smoke alarm once). The burnt residue was easily cleaned with a Dobie sponge and a little Bar Keepers Friend (available in most supermarkets). I’ve been using the set for several months now and really like them! The care instructions state the pans are dishwasher safe. However, I’ve learned the hard way that this type of pan can and will warp if moisture gets between the pan and it’s bottom. Best to hand wash them.
customer_reviews.author: Kalawa

customer_reviews.title: These pots and pans are worth twice the price
customer_reviews.text: I’m just getting to know these pans and I love them. They have a nice “feel”, balance and weight to them also. They aren’t Teflon but honestly they don’t need it. I’ve used the saucepans and skillets and haven’t had anything stick. I also love how much faster these pans boil and heat too. I’m using these on a glass top range and they respond wonderfully. I am so THRILLED to have stumbled on this brand, utterly thrilled.
customer_reviews.author: cynthia gilmore

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great durable quality that will last a lifetime. Need to watch food carefully to avoid burning. And cleaning methods may take more time and technique than what your used to. Definitely worth it rather than those toxic non-stick pots and pans.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Great pans but poor quality control
customer_reviews.text: Use the pans on an induction cooktop. Heat is distributed very evenly. My only complaint is that on a couple of pans in this set the seam near the bottom is not sealed properly and allows for some sort of chemical to ooze out once the pan gets hot. For some reason it’s not letting me upload a photo of the issue.
customer_reviews.author: H. Hury

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the money
customer_reviews.text: arrived as promised, nice and heavy items, good quality, some small lids don't stay on well when moving pot around, they do make some nice on high settings but we normally used mid cooking settings do it's not a problem, all units make noise with induction style cooking. Frying pan is mid size the other is a saute pan not frying pan. used it for 2 weeks and washed by hand and dishwasher, no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Baltimore

customer_reviews.title: excellent quality, heavy duty very pleased with the product
customer_reviews.text: As advertised, excellent quality, heavy duty very pleased with the product. After three months of a kitchen renovation, no cook top or oven the induction cook top was installed and all we needed were pots. Arrived and cooked. First time using stainless for cooking sauteed veggies. Pots clean up easily. Pasta insert great, better than my old Calphalon one. Cleaned them as recommended and dried them right away, look great I highly recommend this product, wish they made a stick free fry pan..
customer_reviews.author: Raymond J. Leone

customer_reviews.title: Awesome quality cookware
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set for my new Bosch induction cooktop. It is wonderful and works great. I do hand wash it most of the time. The dishwasher gets it clean but I want to maintain the lovely sheen. This is heavy duty cookware and I have weak wrists but if I use both hands on the heavier pieces I am ok. If anything sticks, Barkeepers Friend takes it right off. I love the glass lids as I like to see what's going on in a pot. The skillets have no lids but lids from my previous cookware fit them. I highly recommend this cookware.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Shiny pots
customer_reviews.text: I received this set of pots and pans for Christmas and absolutely love them. One night I was steaming some vegetables and the water boiled out of the pot leaving the bottom all brown. Cleaning it was easy and it came out looking like new again. Just made French toast yesterday using cooking spray and clean up was a breeze. The only feature that is taking time to getting accustomed to is cooking on medium heat. I have learned to put water on earlier to boil and putting a lid on the pot to contain the heat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid & Shiny
customer_reviews.text: I like the look of the Duxtop SSIB-17 Professional 17 Pieces Stainless Steel Induction Cookware Set. They are heavy and durable. My prior pans had the Teflon non-stick surface, so I am used to non-stick cookware. The only feature that I do not like is that my morning eggs stick to the pan. Clean-up is not easy. I did "season" every pan as directed; but you must "season" again prior to each use if washing with soap and water.
customer_reviews.author: Brendalee

customer_reviews.title: Best pans I've ever touched.
customer_reviews.text: I love these. They are so heavy duty! Solid pans. I use them at least once a day, and I still think they will last forever.
customer_reviews.author: Mikyj

customer_reviews.title: Just Great cookware for even heating and cooking!
customer_reviews.text: I hadn't updated my cookwear in over 20 years, other than an occasional new piece and was very interested in stainless steel set that offered even heating and cooking (didn't have that with my calphalon). It was amazing to watch the first few simmered recipes bubble along with even heating on the bottom. It's a pleasure to cook with and clean up is easy. So glad I decided on Duxtop.
customer_reviews.author: Beth D

customer_reviews.title: WAS O.K. TILL AFTER USING IT
customer_reviews.text: DISLIKE IT HAS TO BE SHINE AFTER EACH USE USED DAWN POWERWASH I JUST BOUGHT TODAY AND IT DIDN'T CLEAN IT USED IT 2 TIMES AND STILL DIDN'T CLEAN IT GOT TO USE BARRS POLISH EVERYTIME WE USE IT NOT WHAT I EXPECT WHEN PURCHASE IT IN SEPT. 22 2020 DONALD SINDLEDECKER
customer_reviews.author: D E Sindledecker Decker Electric

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: We just bought an induction stove and had to upgrade all our cookware. Highly recommend and we are now Duxtop fans for life. Well made, heavy-duty and cooks using the new stove perfectly. We read a few bad reviews about the food sticking and discoloration that haven't been an issue for us. We looked at some of the more expensive products, you will be happy with this set for a fraction of the cost. By the way if you haven't cooked with induction heat yet, it is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Induction cooking is a learning experience
customer_reviews.text: Every day cooking. With all the negative reviews on Duxtop cookware, I was hesitant to purchase these. They do scratch easily but you need to be careful of how your cooking. I’m new to induction cooking, so heating the pans up to fast is my own problem. All in all they are as good as my last stainless steel cookware by Emeril! Which I had for 20 years.
customer_reviews.author: sheK

customer_reviews.title: Very Impressed
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for use with a new induction range. They are very well made, heavy duty with a large base. I did not find the glass tops thin or feeling lower quality as per some other reviews. So far, very impressed with this set.
customer_reviews.author: AnyS

customer_reviews.title: Poor design.
customer_reviews.text: These pots look great, shiny and professional. However, the pot with the pasta insert drives me crazy. If you fill the pot and start to cook, as the water boils, it splashes up between the pot and insert, splashing all over you and the stove. A poor design! The taller small stock pot is not nearly as heavy as the rest of the pots. The smaller rounded perforated insert doesn't allow a lid to be used. Ptherwise the quality is good, design is poor'
customer_reviews.author: susie

customer_reviews.title: Great product and well designed
customer_reviews.text: The pans are well built with enough mass such that they do not warp and maintain a smooth flat bottom which is essential for an induction range. The pans have a curbed out lip making pouring easy and the lids fit perfectly. Nice product. The utensils that came with the set are interesting, they are all one piece (no rivets etc) and the handles are hollow to reduce weight all while be made out of stainless steel. Update. I have bought two more sets for family members, they all love them
customer_reviews.author: Paul Day

customer_reviews.title: No High Hopes here
customer_reviews.text: I have mixed feelings about this pan set. It leaves food burnt into the pans. I've been trying like crazy to clean them to the condition their were before I cooked but nooo way. I don't care what I used food residue remains. And don't ever try to cook a Grilled cheese sandwich. Good luck with that. But I'm not too happy with this product
customer_reviews.author: TheShopperZ

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully built hard to clean
customer_reviews.text: These are wonderfully built pots and pans with great heat resistant handles. They are a joy to cook on. The instructions ask you to season everything before using it which we did but we still struggle with them staining up all the time. I'm waiting to order a 2nd set for my cabin until we can figure out a solution.
customer_reviews.author: mick

customer_reviews.title: Great quality at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Heavy gauge, quality materials. Heating is very even and controlled, no hot spots. These compare to others at 3x the price, will last a lifetime! Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: F F Hein II

customer_reviews.title: Excellent pots!
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought an induction cooktop and found these pots listed on Amazon with good customer reviews, so I tried them. They're great! Sturdy, nice looking, and effective. They wash up easily. I've been very pleased with them so far.
customer_reviews.author: lppardue

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded Expecations
customer_reviews.text: This is the most reasonably priced induction ware cook set with outstanding quality on the market. This set has the quality to outlast even my old stainless steel set which was purchased when I got married 40 years ago. Cooking is an art in which I love to express my love for food. Without the proper tools, in which these exceed expectations, cooking becomes a chore, a job. So let me say one more time. No need to look farther for a better set. Your only spending more money for a named product.
customer_reviews.author: reckless1

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value for the quality you get.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value for your money. These are very well-constructed and the heat distribution is very good. I'm sure my family is going to get very good use out of this set.
customer_reviews.author: Joey the Photog

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product at a Great Price
customer_reviews.text: I used the pans on an induction cooktop and had great results. They heated quickly and evenly and were easy to clean. Can’t speak to long term durability yet, but so far I’m very satisfied. The set is quite a bargain compared to other brands that are suitable for induction cooking.
customer_reviews.author: Quee

customer_reviews.title: These pans are durable and there is no need to use high heat .
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my daughter. These are well worth every single dime. Beautiful and just amazing on how well they distribute heat evenly. I would highly recommend these to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Buy it...
customer_reviews.text: Great pots and pans set. Love it. Kind of heavy to use, but nothing like cast iron. I exchanged my cast iron for this stainless steel. So far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely a cook’s dream!
customer_reviews.text: I love the weight of the pan but most of all the even heat on my induction stove top. There is a lid for all the set which is rarely found. Worth every cent spent!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Houser

customer_reviews.title: Insane amount of BUZZZZING on the induction stove top.
customer_reviews.text: These things are very good quality and nice and stable on the glass top, but they BUZZ so loudly. I tried all of them hoping I had a bum piece, but the buzzing just changes pitch as the pans get smaller. It makes cooking a mental exercise, and if you leave the kitchen the noise follows us around the house...literally 20 feet away, with the TV on, and i can hear them. Don't know if I can send them back as they were packed so tight in the box I'll never get them back in. Damn
customer_reviews.author: Chris Binnett

customer_reviews.title: Heavy, Well Made, Quality
customer_reviews.text: These pots and pans far exceeds what I expected. They're every bit as good as most reviews stated. These are quality. I'm very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Jan Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: First time cooking with induction heating, these pots and pans are incredible. I know some reviews said that they were difficult to clean but if you put water in them right away and scrub them they’re simple and come out beautiful and shiny. I did buy the bar keepers secret and scrub sponges they suggested as well but haven’t had to use them yet. Delivery was fast as I now live quite rural.
customer_reviews.author: if I could rate it six star I would really fun game

customer_reviews.title: Works great on induction cooktop!
customer_reviews.text: The units heat well and uniform. The interior can sometimes be a little difficult to clean, but this is common with stainless steel pans and this set performs very well. The handles are much better than other sets as far as staying cool; however, during prolonged use, they will still become hot.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Miller

customer_reviews.title: Material is solid, well built but...
customer_reviews.text: Material is solid, well built and balanced well. I just got them a few weeks ago and use them on induction stove. Almost a year into their use, they are stained inside. This is partly our fault bc it isn’t aluminum, it doesn’t hold up like aluminum. So now are these ugly water stains inside that make them look dirty and aged well beyond their use. This is not even from excessive use. If they were used 2x per week that would be a lot. Still solid and good lids.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Papi

customer_reviews.title: Cooking more
customer_reviews.text: Easier to clean with bar clean But beautiful and makes me want to cook more and not just watch my husband
customer_reviews.author: love it

customer_reviews.title: URGENT do not buy-- NOT SAFE
customer_reviews.text: I have now had 2 of the lids basically explode on me. I have no way of getting a hold of seller and have only had these a few months. These should be under warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne E.

customer_reviews.title: Best cookware ever!
customer_reviews.text: All of these years I’ve been using Teflon. I thought stainless would be hard to clean. Not so! I love my Duxtop cookware. Everything cooks evenly not just in the middle. I’ll never use anything else!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly W.

customer_reviews.title: Nice cookware
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful set of cookware. Easy to clean and cooks food evenly. The glass lids are nice, but it would've been nice if they were interchangeable, or if the fry pans had lids. Otherwise, excellent purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amber B.

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding quality (appearance and functionality) at an excellent price
customer_reviews.text: We needed to replace our cookware because we were switching to a Wolf induction range, which requires cookware with ferromagnetic bottoms to receive the ac magnetic energy from the induction surface. These Duxtop pots and pans have the requisite magnetic borrows bonded within bright stainless steel, which both looks great and is very easy to clean. The lids are glass with stainless steel edges and handles, ant the cookware handles are low thermal conductivity stainless steel, for both cool handling on the cooktop, but high oven temperature compatibility. Great set!
customer_reviews.author: RCE

customer_reviews.title: Love it!,,,
customer_reviews.text: We love this set! Having used already most of the pieces in multiple preparations ( frying,braising,stewing,sauteeing,boiling) every pot and pan performed beautifully. Just follow a few simple instructions (stay between medium and low temperature,medium will be your new high, do not use metal utensils to prevent scratching) and this set will deliver! Do not use metal or harsh sponges to clean them, for sturborn stains just a little Bar Keepers Friend with a scratch free scrubber sponge (I use Jetz Scrubz) works like magic.
customer_reviews.author: Learning4life

customer_reviews.title: they clean up nicely with very little hard scrubbing
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cookware when I got a new convection cooktop. I've only been using two weeks or so, but they appear to cook evenly and quickly. I hand wash them, they clean up nicely with very little hard scrubbing. The only reason I didn't give them 5 stars is because the 1.6 quart sauce pan has become a bit mottled on the bottom. In truth, I don't know if this is expected or whether perhaps I should apply a bit more elbow grease when I scrub them. Has no effect whatsoever on the quality of the result, just an observation. Love them so far.
customer_reviews.author: scubaamy

customer_reviews.title: all has been great! Don't assume they work like your old cheap ...
customer_reviews.text: Really enjoying these pots and pans so far after a couple months use. First time using stainless steel which was a bit intimidating but after a quick bit of research on how to properly cook and clean them, all has been great! Don't assume they work like your old cheap nonstick and you won't burn and overcook food, and make sure to use barkeepers friend to clean to avoid discoloration.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Must Have!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this set and well worth it!! Have used them everyday and looks new after every use
customer_reviews.author: The Smith’s

customer_reviews.title: The quality of this cookware is amazing
customer_reviews.text: I brought this Duxtop SSIB-17 Professional 17 piece Stainless Steel Induction Cookware Set for my sister for Christmas 2018 and she loved it, she no longer needs to wear the cooking gloves because the handles of the cookware doesn't get hot plus these very easy to clean, she wanted another 8.6Qt stockpot so I had to wait two weeks because they were out of stock but within one week this item was back in stock, I definitely recommend this cookware set, the seller was also very helpful (Lafraise) he told me when the 8.6Qt stockpot would be available.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Impoco

customer_reviews.title: These work great!
customer_reviews.text: I recently switched to an induction stove top. These pots and pans are perfect for induction cooking. They are very good looking, solid, and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this Set!
customer_reviews.text: Terrific pans, great set. I was amazed at how heavy the pans are. They have quite some heft to them. They clean with ease, heat quickly. The only negative - which really is not a negative - is that the lids do double duty so if you are using a lid with the frying pan, you don't have it for the cook pot it fits. But these pans are so nice who cares! Glass lids have a steam hole which I did not notice in the pictures.
customer_reviews.author: JStaR

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love these pans!
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit nervous to cook in these at first. I was worried everything was going to stick. I seasoned all of my pans as directed and couldn’t be more pleased. Each pan heats perfectly and holds the heat nicely. These pans are really easy to clean and I highly recommend getting a set for yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Shilo Shewmake

customer_reviews.title: Duxtop is a Great product for amazing price
customer_reviews.text: I bought an induction stove and needed new cookware but didn’t want to overspend. I am more than impressed with this product and it is such a great price for high quality. Highly recommend Duxtop cookware
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Tranchida

customer_reviews.title: I love our new pans
customer_reviews.text: I love our new pans! I read a customer review that suggested seasoning the frying pans with coconut oil. This essentially makes them non-stick. I found the video on YouTube under "seasoning stainless steel pans". It worked great. Even eggs did not stick. I still use a bit of butter, but that is for flavor. I love the steamer, although we have used it as a strainer for boiling potatoes as well. Great pan set!
customer_reviews.author: tmcgant

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: Great to cook with. The best cookware I have ever had.
customer_reviews.author: R.

customer_reviews.title: Love this set!
customer_reviews.text: It was time for me to get a new set of pots and pans. I checked many local stores and didn't see anything I liked in the price range that I was looking for. I checked these out on Amazon and really liked the way they look plus the price was great for all you get! I highly recommend to anyone looking to purchase this set. They cook evenly and clean up is quick! This is a highly professional set and makes cooking more fun! As stated in the description this set can be used for these cooking sources: electric, gas, infrared, induction stove or radiant glass and ceramic cooktop
customer_reviews.author: Robyn Smith

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I purchased this set instead of a more expensive set to try out stainless steel. I have to say we love them. The quality is wonderful. Not to heavy for a smaller hand. Very nice looking set. I would recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: 4 stars for limited non-stick.
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent set. I would not recommend the pans in this set for an induction cooktop, which is what I have. The boiler and the steamer on the other hand are the best we've had. Excellent build and finish. They look nice too! These pans are not non-stick so be aware. They look nice, are good for cooking soups and other water filled meals. They're not the best for frying food.
customer_reviews.author: Raphael

customer_reviews.title: Good value and quality!!!
customer_reviews.text: Every pros has been written by others purchaser so i wouldn't be reviewing them again. I have something different for you: In case you're wondering what is the difference between SSIB-17 and SSIB-19 sets. SSIB-17's items have larger overall size than SSIB-19, hence 19 is cheaper than 17 pcs. You can compare the Qt volumes of both sets. You're welcome.
customer_reviews.author: KS

customer_reviews.title: Solid feel.  Quality construction
customer_reviews.text: I love the solid feel to these pans. I did season the pans that would be used to saute, but they have been great. The utensils are surprisingly good too. Am currently using them on our gas range, but will soon be using them on induction. I really can't wait!
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Schultz

customer_reviews.title: Duxtop SSIB-17 Professional 17 Pieces Stainless Steel Induction Cookware Set,
customer_reviews.text: good price for what is in the set. Haven'y used yet. Looks great
customer_reviews.author: Edward J. Kriewaldt

customer_reviews.title: very durable
customer_reviews.text: I have been cooking for years and have always cooked on sub-par cookware. Not anymore. I was tired of the coated pans and I wanted a great quality stainless set. This is them! I will say this, reading reviews before I bought themI read where people were saying they were heavy. Well, heavy to me meant durable and quality. The pans are not that heavy, but they do have some weight to them. Do not be afraid to buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: C. Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I have had this product for about a month now and all I can say is this is a superior cookware se and it meets my expectations so far. The seller too have excellent customer service. They quickly replaced one of the pot which had a small dent at the base when it got delivered and also gave me tips on how to maintain the pot especially cleaning the interior with bar keeper's friend. The heat distribution is top notch. No complaints so far!
customer_reviews.author: Richie

customer_reviews.title: Solid product
customer_reviews.text: Great product for home use. Be sure to use the appropriate cleaning products to keep your set in top shape.
customer_reviews.author: SCantu

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and heavy duty!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome and heavy duty pans!!!! I got them for my husband to use with his Nuwave cook surface. HE LOVES THEM!!!!! We had the calphalon pans prior to these. The new pans heat up MUCH quicker than the calphalon!!! I recommend purchasing the Scrub Buddies to clean them with. They make cleaning them a breeze!!!! Here is the link for those:
customer_reviews.author: T. Griffith

customer_reviews.title: Great pots without emptying your wallet.
customer_reviews.text: We recently bought an induction cook top and had no idea which pans to buy. After a lengthy search on the internet, we decided to go with the Duxtop SSIB-17 Professional set of pots and pans. We couldn't be happier. The price was reasonable, and they perform beautifully. We will purchase more items from Duxtop as we need them.
customer_reviews.author: MBock

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Just got my new duxtop cookware set! Haven't used them yet but so far I am very pleased! They look very classy and feel heavy duty! Can't wait to cook something!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love love love these!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a great cook and I've had the same old cook ware for 30 years.. These are beautiful and quite efficient!!! I don't understand the sticking problems I see in other reviews.. Just turn down the heat!!! These are EFFICIENT! Also use PAM cooking spray for the eggs.. They'll be absolutely perfact EVERY time.. The dis - colorations are normal and a swish of white vinegar takes care of it. If you gotta scrub, always keep the "bar keepers friend" on hand ( it's a good house keepers friend!). They are beautiful and I'm so proud.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Smith-Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Solid construction with even heat distribution.
customer_reviews.text: Just starting using and very impressed so far. It feels great not being exposed to chemical bonding agents. If well maintained (not difficult), this substantial cookware will last a very long time. My wife and I are very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey David Fischmann

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I love this set. So we’ll made and looks beautiful on my pot rack. I was not interested in spending $800 on a set but wanted one that would last. It is important to read all about how to use them properly however
customer_reviews.author: Dana Jackett

customer_reviews.title: These are amazing
customer_reviews.text: Buy them. They look great. They are super easy to clean. Feel way more expensive than they are and this package came with a TON of pots and pans. Best purchase!
customer_reviews.author: LFrue009

customer_reviews.title: Rember this nis not non-stick
customer_reviews.text: These pans are a great product for the money- Work best when properly seasoned. Coat interior of pans with high temp oil(olive, flax seed or something similar) heat till oil smokes and let cool--Wipe out excess oil and store. Most cooking residue will wipe out with a paper towel
customer_reviews.author: David Ronne

customer_reviews.title: Overall good value
customer_reviews.text: Takes a little more muscle than non-stick. Heavy weighted. Good quality. Love how well they work with my induction burners!
customer_reviews.author: Cellularly Connected

customer_reviews.title: The set works well with our induction stove top.
customer_reviews.text: We've only had this cookware set for less than a month, but so far we've been very happy with how the set works with our induction stove top. The cookware does clean up very nicely and we've had no complaints. We also like the glass tops that enables us to keep an eye on what's cooking without having to lift the lid.
customer_reviews.author: JAS

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: These pots and pans are an upgrade to my previous cooking tools
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this set
customer_reviews.text: This is my first set of induction cookware for my first induction cookware. Love the weight of the pots and pans.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Really great set of induction pans
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for an induction pan set - and this set is great. Like other reviewers said - great quality and reasonably heavy - and solid. Works perfectly on my new induction stove. I do get some spotting on the pans - not sure if it is the pan or how I am cleaning. I would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Love love love!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these for my gas range! Not fond of the two smaller skillets bc they stick. However every other piece in this set is amazing!!!! Wish I had two of the big skillets with the small and long handles:)
customer_reviews.author: Amaz

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: My family and I were needing a new set of cookware and wanted to move towards stainless steel- This was great for the price and meeting all of our main cooking needs.
customer_reviews.author: Asta

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality, unbeatable price.
customer_reviews.text: I discovered this company when I bought a coffee maker, which exceeded my expectation on quality. I am so pleased with the quality and prices of their products that I bought this set and a bread maker!! Very good quality product. It looks like $1000 set.
customer_reviews.author: Iuliia Gerasymenko

customer_reviews.title: Great pans!
customer_reviews.text: These pans seem really nice. I haven't tried to cook anything that would really stick, but so far they have cleaned up really well and the quality is really nice. Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: K H

customer_reviews.title: Missing Cover, but overall a very nice set.
customer_reviews.text: I love my pots! The handles too!!!! My cooking is even and the cleaning of them is so easy :) I gave it a 3 start because both of the smaller pots are supposed to have a cover, but only one came with a cover as advertised. So I found it kind of odd. Other than that, I am very happy with my set. I just wish the company would had not forgotten one simple pot cover. :(
customer_reviews.author: Trina Garland

customer_reviews.title: ABSOLUTELY THE BEST COOKWARE EVER
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely the best cookware by far that I have ever used. It conducts heat so well I can keep the burner turned down to 4 or below. The pans are solid but not at all heavy. The bottoms are smooth so they don't scratch my ceramic stovetop. Even though they are not non-stick, I have not had any problems with sticking or food cooking onto the pans. I would highly recommend this cookware to anyone looking for quality cookware. I expect it to last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Knolls5

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Overall an excellent product. We are new to induction stove top cooking and searched for the best product to make that transition and feel we made the right choice
customer_reviews.author: Sandra L. Scrivner

customer_reviews.title: Solid cookware set!
customer_reviews.text: No major complaints, only they get scorched quickly if the cook is not watching closely.
customer_reviews.author: Janine Reilly

customer_reviews.title: Excellent cookware
customer_reviews.text: Well made, heavy duty induction cookware. Nice selection of sizes. Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: candy alderman

customer_reviews.title: Induction cookware rocks!
customer_reviews.text: This cookware set was a gift for family members. They love everything about it. They have an induction cooktop that they were having troubles with cookware sitting properly and operating on it. This set operates perfectly, looks beautiful, cleans up perfectly. I did buy the bar top cleaner for them but I think hot soapy water works at clean up most of the time. There is a little bit of a learning curve for cooking with stainless steel but it's better for your health to cook most food at lower temperatures anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Christina J. Riggan

customer_reviews.title: Best cookware ever!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent!!! Best cookware ever! Works great on induction stoves, can also be use on gas and regular electric stoves. Highly recommended. Excellent price
customer_reviews.author: Katia Salvador

customer_reviews.title: These Pans Make Learning and Using Induction Easy and Affordable
customer_reviews.text: Love my pans. They work absolutely wonderfully with my induction stove - they are easy to clean and always look shiny and new. Love them and the price cannot be beat!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: The pans are great! Just like all pans they clean up easy if cared for properly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great set for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I like the set, it has great quality pots except for the frying pans. Each time I fry eggs or pancakes, it gets really sticky under the pan. Also, the color of the pans turned brown the first time I used them and does't get clean after washing. I ended up purchasing a different frying pan for my pancakes and eggs, apart from that the other items in the set are excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Very well made heats quickly Witch makes it good for a fast sear on meats .I know I will enjoy for a long time
customer_reviews.author: coco

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Practical an Awesome Cooking
customer_reviews.text: I bought the cookware to complement my new electric induction cooktop. Amazing! Very solid cookware and evenly distribute heat. My old ugly pans were donated immediately! No more mis-match and inconsistent cooking for me! Recommend you also purchase "Barkeepers Friends" soft cleanser to keep them spotless.
customer_reviews.author: M. Williams

product_meta.title: Duxtop Professional 17 Pieces Stainless Steel Induction Cookware Set, Impact-bonded Technology
product_meta.description:
17 Piece Professional Grade Cookware
Items included in set:

1.6Qt Saucepan w/lid
2.5Qt Saucepan w/lid
4.2Qt Casserole w/lid
8.6Qt Stock Pot w/lid
8 inch Fry Pan
10 inch Fry Pan
5.5Qt SautePan w/lid
Boiler Basket
Steam Basket
3 piece kitchen tools
feature_bullets: Includes 8 and 9.5-inch fry pans; 1.6-Quart, 2.5-Quart sauce pans with lids;8.6-Quart stock pot with lid; 4.2-Quart casserole with lid;5.5-Quart Saute pan with helper and lid;9.5-inch pasta basket and steam basket; 3 pcs kitchen tools.
Constructed with 18/10 commercial grade stainless steel, heavy gauge impact-bonded aluminum encapsulated bottom, build to last for a life time
Ergonomically shaped handle with anti-slippery satin finish, handle is riveted to pan provide durability
Suitable for all cooking source, electric, gas, infrared, induction stove or Radiant glass and ceramic cooktop
Dishwasher-safe; oven-safe to 550 degrees F; freezer-safe for food storage; Lifetime Limited warranty

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars1,167 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
